attributes.action: Award former Sub Postmaster Alan Bates an OBE for services to Sub Postmasters.
attributes.additional_details: Alan Bates worked tirelessly for over a decade to get justice and recognition for all those Sub Postmasters who were wrongly convicted under the Horizon scandal. He deserves recognition for his hard work, perseverance and courage in bringing the scandal to light.
attributes.background: Recognise the work Alan Bates did to get justice for all those affected by the Horizon scandal at the Royal Mail

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition. 

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
